title: A new way to earn
summary: Starting now, you’ll earn up to {{percent}}% annually on your cUSD balance.

earnWeekly.text: Send and spend as usual, you’ll earn on the remaining balance.

noMinCommitment.earningText: Earning is stress free: You’re earning already.
noMinCommitment.connectText: Earning is stress free: Connect your phone number to start earning.

saveMoreEarnMore.text: Earn up to {{maxSaving}} cUSD per year by saving {{rewardsMax}} cUSD.

conclusion: It’s that simple. Start saving for your future today.
